function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Aerosol transmission of SARS-CoV-2","Impact":"Direct and indirect spread of the virus, increase in morbidity and mortality of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Improved ventilation systems, air purification, and adherence to protective measures","Technologies":"HEPA filters, UV-C light disinfection, and mechanical ventilation","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and individuals in crowded indoor environments","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, and building managers"},{"Description":"Ambient aerosol pollution reduction","Impact":"Reduced air pollution and improvement of air quality","Mitigation":"Implementation of sustainable policies, reduction in the use of fossil fuels, and promotion of alternative energy sources","Technologies":"Renewable energy systems, emission control technologies, and public transportation infrastructure","People":"General public, environmental organizations, and policymakers","Owner":"Government, environmental agencies, and energy sector"},{"Description":"Impact of HVAC systems on the spread of COVID-19","Impact":"Potential facilitation of virus transmission in indoor environments","Mitigation":"Enhanced filtration, regular maintenance of HVAC systems, and air quality monitoring","Technologies":"Advanced air filters, air quality sensors, and UV-C germicidal irradiation","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, and maintenance staff","Owner":"Facility management, HVAC contractors, and public health authorities"}]}
